modName: A sexy glass Armor for CBBE - NKT
summary: Replace the glass armor by another one more sexy and remeshed.
descriptionHtml:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/209/screenshot33z.jpg/][IMG]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/6243/screenshot33z.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/192/updateso.png/][IMG]http://img192.imageshack.us/img192/3304/updateso.png[/IMG][/URL]

Version 1.1 (next version)
   - Armor fully compatible with CBBE (ankles fixed).
   - Cleared first person view.
   - Water bug fixed.
   - lighting fixed.

Version 1.0 (curently version)
  - Mesh fxed.
  - The armor is sizeable.

Version 0.9 
   - Base.

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/24/descri.png/][IMG]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/3480/descri.png[/IMG][/URL]


This mod replaces the glass armor with a new version specially adapted for CBBE. 

It can be installed using Nexus Mod Manager 

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/content/modmanager/

The bodies used for the armor is CBBE v2 bodies. But as the textures that have been released until now are compatible with all body mods, there shouldn\'t be any problem if you use another body.


[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/808/recomanded.png/][IMG]http://img808.imageshack.us/img808/4800/recomanded.png[/IMG][/URL]


Caliente Body v2

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666


[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/546/optionale.png/][IMG]http://img546.imageshack.us/img546/6702/optionale.png[/IMG][/URL]


Bangos Glass Female Armor retexture

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3243

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/810/instalid.png/][IMG]http://img810.imageshack.us/img810/9905/instalid.png[/IMG][/URL]


Extract files into your data folder. and check in skyrim launcher 
or Nexus Mod Manager.

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/43/optionale.png/][IMG]http://img43.imageshack.us/img43/6702/optionale.png[/IMG][/URL]


1. Start Skyrim launcher, click Data Files, .esp.
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/193/bugsci.png/][IMG]http://img193.imageshack.us/img193/605/bugsci.png[/IMG][/URL]

Not reported yet.

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/823/creditsx.png/][IMG]http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/3241/creditsx.png[/IMG][/URL]


Work based on Bangos retexture work. so thanks to him for inspiration and good luck to him for futur mods.


==================================

==================================
